title: Hildegart Rodríguez Carballeira
summary: Hildegart Rodríguez Carballeira (9 December 1914 in Madrid – 9 June 1933 in Madrid) was an activist for socialism and sexual revolution, who was raised by her mother as a model for the woman of the future. She spoke four languages when she was eight years old, finished law school as a teenager, and was a leader of the Spanish Socialist Workers' Party (PSOE) which she abandoned in favor of extreme republicanism, joining the Federal Democratic Republican Party (PRDF).When she was 18 years old and had become internationally known, her mother shot her to death.
